#summary IDL program files

=== Sub Directories ===
    * [ProAstro astro] -- Astronomy routines
    * [ProClassgal classgal] -- Judith Racusin's code for classifying galaxies based on color and morphology
    * [ProFileio fileio] -- File input/output
    * [ProFiles files] -- Programs for file naming, testing and searching.
    * [ProFits fits] -- Modified versions of idlastron library tools
    * [ProHtm htm] -- Tools wrapping the C functions htm_index, htmMatchC, htm_intersect.
    * [ProIdlstruct_files idlstruct_files] -- Tools for reading/writing idl structures
    * [ProPlotting plotting] -- Generic Plotting Routines
    * [ProPostgres postgres] -- A class wrapping the pgsql_query() C function.
    * [ProProbgal probgal] -- Bayesian Star-Galaxy Separation Routines
    * [ProSdss sdss] -- General tools for SDSS data analysis
    * [ProSdsspix sdsspix] -- IDL Wrappers for modified versions of Ryan Scranton's SDSSPix C routines
    * [ProSpherical_polygons spherical_polygons] -- IDL Wrappers for Modified versions of Andreas Berlind's spherical polygon code
    * [ProStatistics statistics] -- Generic Statistics Routines
    * [ProStruct struct] -- Tools for manipulating IDL structures
    * [ProUtil util] -- Utilities for general data manipulation
